text: When we turn to AWS, we are looking

for a more efficient way
of launching our AI solution,

and also to have a good
partner, which can work with us

and bring us into this new
journey to build new features.

We are using Amazon SageMaker
to explore new models,
upcoming plugins from the community,
or from some of the third party models.
It help us easily

to adopt these new models
into our testing pipeline

and also fine tuning on
top of the foundation models.

And we use Amazon Bedrock
in our production to deploy

and to scale up for our
usage for our customers.

We have introduced market
insights, which is using the AI
to analyze new sentiment
and also some technical analysis data.
And through our main application,
we deliver this message
and all these signals to our user so

that they can have a more
informed choice of investment.
Building on AWS empowers to go ahead
of our competitors

because we can provide a more
intelligent way for them
to interact with our app

and also to get more information
from the market in real

time by our AI generation
application and analysis.
